name: Genera Interactive
overview:
PlayTales is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Genera Interactive, an internationally based multi-platform mobile entertainment and utilities provider with offices in USA, UK, Spain, Romania, and China. Founded in 2010, PlayTales develops and distributes interactive playable storybooks for children within the world’s leading children’s bookstore. PlayTales applications can be downloaded through the iTunes App Store, Google Play, Amazon.com, Blackberry App World, Intel App Up, and Verizon V-Cast. To contact the PlayTales staff please send an email to info@playtalesbooks.com or visit our website www.playtalesbooks.com.

PlayTales books are recommended for children ages one to eight and are some of the highest-quality interactive books currently available. PlayTales Gold offers users access to a variety of interactive stories, full of original sound effects and animations, for a low monthly price. The PlayTales library features classic children´s tales such as The Ugly Duckling, Sleeping Beauty, and Puss in Boots, along with new favorites like Pocoyo and Felix the Cat. PlayTales Gold also features educational books that help children learn to count, read, spell, and more. PlayTales stories are developed by a dedicated team of educators, illustrators, and technology professionals who are dedicated to producing wholesome and fun interactive books for children. All stories are designed to inspire, entertain, and educated readers.

PlayTales Gold features (newest app):

  • Stories available in 8 languages
  • New stories every week!
  • Original animation, sound effects, illustration, and interactive features in every story
  • Users can access personal library without internet connection
  • Download as many stories as you like!
  • Universal subscription between iOS devices
  • Universal description between Android devices
